phrases: I just realised it for the first time
That I had fallen in love
Twenty-four hours a day thinking of you, you and nothing more than you!
It is something I was not consciously aware of
Somehow ( somehow) I am feeling different from the usual
With you ( the two of us) and our dull chatter
Do not tell me ( mutual love?)
Nope, it is a one-sided crush
Why is my heart pounding like this?
Did a short circuit just make a mess out of my mind?
This is my first time... feeling like this...
I wonder if I have a fever
Suddenly and precipitately, love has arrived.
Instantly igniting my face into a bright red
Is this really what they call love?
I want to know your feelings.
I feel I could fly towards the sky
Woke up in the morning, brushed my teeth
In the blink of an eye, it is 10pm
Today, we laughed a whole lot
At times, with my friends, acting like fools, being noisy
I would not call this my first love
Say, will we be able to meet again tomorrow?
I see you sparkling all over the place
Today was fun, too, was not it?
It is my pleasure to meet you, my new-found love.
Surely, we will meet again tomorrow
We will meet immediately in our dreams
First Period is in the Language Lab.
First Period is in the Language Lab.
I was helping an old lady!
I already used that excuse last week.
Mum was not around... is not a good reason.
At least one car should go by!
How did I get stuck at a red light four times?
First period already started a while ago -
That is such an obvious trap.
There is no way I would fall for such an old tra -
Is this my punishment for being late?
Well, I can just sneak in through the back.
Yeah, there is no reason to get scolded.
I can sneak in through the lower door!
I will creep in like I am air and go into class like I am invisible.
Although, I already have an idea!
The only person that would do this kind of thing is the queen!
If I am discovered sneaking in through the bottom,
I feel like I will get in even more trouble.
If I am going to be discovered,
I might as well go in through the top window!
Stained glass has been put up!
Nothing will be solved if I run away from the classroom.
I might as well go back.
Yes, the question is where it would be best to enter from.
If I am going to get in trouble no matter what,
brazenly charging through the front is...
Appearing with a huge smile while getting hit by the eraser!
And the whole class breaks out in smiles!
What time do you think it is?
Hurry up and take your seat.
Good morning so early in the morning!
What sort of stupid thing are you doing?
It is not like you are still an elementary schooler.
The Invincible Alien is unharmed by your verbal attacks!
Miles must be spinning in his grave!
We just got a little carried away.
Are you trying to torture me!?
My ears are going to fall off!
We are going to do it again, so can you listen to us?
Listen to what I have to say!
I decided to go to the nagashi soumen at a nearby park.
I have only seen a nagashi soumen on TV before, so I am really excited!
If I do not stand near the top,
I will not be able to get any noodles.
I have not eaten anything all day, so I will sit at the front and eat a lot!
This is the first time I have seen that!
Are you going to leave without even having a single bite?!
Even if the law allows that...
But... um, I do not have chopsticks.
The next is coming right up!
Excuse me, but these chopsticks have been used...
I will just use them upside down.
The next will not be like that!
I will show you the true meaning of hell!
It is foolish to think there will be water forever!
You are a lady, are not you?!
Why not try enjoying the raw flavour?!
The war is not going to wait!
You have not changed at all.
I heard there was a nagashi soumen at the park, so I stopped by.
I have been doing nagashi soumen, thinking that you would appear someday!
It is been 30 years since you left on a journey in search of the ultimate nagashi soumen.
After eating every kind of soumen, I can no longer tell.
Let us wash away the nagashi soumen with water.
TL note: Some restaurants offer nagashi-soumen flowing noodles.
I am sorry, but could you make like nagashi soumen and flow away?
First years, are you all here?
There is the type that grows with praise and the type that grows with criticism.
I will decide that with my instincts as a teacher.
Even though I grow from praise, I do not get praised at all.
I thought I would try tying it up.
Professor, you look a little bit like an older sister.
Hey, hey, just how much like an older sister do I look?
Well, I might not look very older sister-like.
Then, there is no helping it, so I will clean up.
Honestly, there is no helping Sakamoto, either.
What is with all this so suddenly?
And if you are going to cover me, use a towel!
Why are you using a book?
Honestly, Sakamoto, you always try to contradict me.
I am asking what you are doing!
I am going to go do laundry.
All that is left is to turn the dial.
All I have to do is turn it.
If you need help, call me.
You are helpless, Nano, so I will do the cooking.
Well, I am making it right now.
Hey, hey, I will do it.
What am I not supposed to worry about?
What the heck are you guys doing?!
You are so helpless, Sakamoto, walking around there.
There is nothing helpless about that!
It is nothing to get mad at.
I do not understand what you are trying to imply!
Well, I guess I will start over.
Oh, then I will make it.
Well, the other dishes will get cold, so I have to do it quickly.
Hey, Girl, what is up with the kid today?
I think she wants to act like an older sister.
Since I am an older sister.
Did you know that older sisters do not eat snacks?
This time, I really got something!
In a way, is not this better than fish?
If I knew these kinds of things were going to happen,
I would have brought someone along.
I do not want to do my homework!
Why do we even have to do homework in the first place?
Well, since my marks are not good, I have to do it.
But I am equipped with enough skill to avoid failing marks,
so I will not be held back.
And after I graduate, I do not want to go to university to study more.
But I heard on TV that it is difficult to find employment.
Without a degree, it might be difficult.
You cannot get through without a university entrance exam.
But right now, I do not want to study!
Anyway, how will what I am studying now help me in the future?!
What is my dream for the future?
My Dream for the Future, by Aioi Yukko.
My dream for the future is to be a frill-necked lizard.
I do not want to study!
I do not want to study, and I do not want to be a frill-necked lizard!
If I become a frill-necked lizard, I might be released from this burden.
But I might as well become a living national treasure and be spoiled.
By the way, I wonder how much a living national treasure gets paid a month.
And how do you become a living national treasure in the first place?
And more importantly, what is a living national treasure?
What I want to be... want to be... want to be...
I cannot come up with anything.
Well, I am still a first year high schooler.
I have three years to think about it.
If I cannot figure it out by then...
I do not want to study!
Getting depressed about it will not help.
I should worry after I think of what I want to be!
I will try thinking of something I would like to do!
Something I would like to do... like to do, huh?
What time do you think it is?!
Well, I do not really understand hard things.
For now, how about I do my homework?
I do not want to do my homework!
It is me, the origami frill-necked lizard!
It is really difficult to make me in origami!
To make me, you are going to need two pieces of paper!
